an7.20:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhasamadane tibbacchando hoti ayatinca sikkhasamadane avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.4: dhammanisantiya tibbacchando hoti ayatinca dhammanisantiya avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.5: icchavinaye tibbacchando hoti ayatinca icchavinaye avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.6: patisallane tibbacchando hoti ayatinca patisallane avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.7: viriyarambhe tibbacchando hoti ayatinca viriyarambhe avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.8: satinepakke tibbacchando hoti ayatinca satinepakke avigatapemo,
an7.20:1.9: ditthipativedhe tibbacchando hoti ayatinca ditthipativedhe avigatapemo.
